DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacodynamic effect LDL cholesterol ( LDL-C )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study BMS-823778 Subjects With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Hypercholesterolemia Currently take stable daily dose statin therapy Serum triglyceride level < 500mg/dl History myocardial infarction , coronary angioplasty bypass graft , valvular disease repair , unstable angina pectoris , transient ischemic attack , cerebrovascular accident within six month prior entry study Congestive heart failure Diabetes mellitus Active liver disease Impaired renal function Hepatitis C , B HIV This list inclusive ; additional information provide protocol
